subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Ben Davis spent parts of seven seasons in the majors as a catcher, but now he is trying one more time to get back to the big leagues as a pitcher in the unaffiliated minors.
snippet: Ben Davis spent parts of seven seasons in the majors as a catcher, but now he is trying one more time to get back to the big leagues as a pitcher in the unaffiliated minors.
